# City Council

The regular meetings of the Council shall be held on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each and every month at the hour of 7:00 p.m.; provided, that regular meetings shall be held on the next succeeding day when the meeting day is a state-established holiday.Â 

The Committee-of-the-Whole shall meet on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each and every month at 6:00 p.m., and if determined necessary on the third Tuesday of each and every month at 6:00 p.m., except if at any time the Committee-of-the-Whole meeting falls on a holiday, the Committee shall meet on the next business day at the same hour.

All meetings of the City Council shall be held in the City Hall situated at 207 West Second Street in the City, unless Council at a previous meeting decides to hold them elsewhere.

[CITY COUNCIL PROCEDURES MANUAL](https://www.grandview.wa.us/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/CITY-COUNCIL-PROCEDURES-MANUAL.pdf)
